"${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "ProgramCode": "${#Project#ProgramCode}", "GrossAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#GrossAmount}", Guid#result}_B_PR", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "LineNumber": 1 } ], "Tenders": [ { "TenderCode": "${Process Tender Type#Response#$['TenderCode']}", "TransactionTenderCode": "DISCOVER1", "TenderAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_A_PR", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", }, { "TenderCode": "CASH", "TenderAmount":
